emi.dev.duplicate_recipe_id:
Recipe ID is a duplicate of another recipe
§7%s§r
Recipes need to have unique IDs to be serialized
This will break other recipes with this ID
emi.dev.null_input_or_output:
Recipe's inputs or outputs are §7null§r
Use an empty list for no inputs or outputs
Use §7EmiStack.EMPTY§r to represent an empty stack
emi.dev.duplicate_vanilla_recipe_id:
Recipe ID is a duplicate of a vanilla recipe
§7%s§r
Recipes need to have unique IDs to be serialized
This will break the vanilla recipe with the same ID
emi.dev.no_output_slots:
Recipe's slots do not include any outputs
Call §7SlotWidget.recipeContext(this)§r on outputs§r
emi.dev.null_recipe_id:
Recipe ID is §7null§r
Recipes need to have unique IDs to be serialized
This will only affect this recipe
